name: 莊賀喬
objective:
本課程以實踐機器人和人工智慧應用為核心，採用美國麻省理工學院 (MIT) 的專案任務導向學習模式。透過結合講授、討論、實際應用和案分析，課程將會幫助學生深入理解人工智慧和機器人技術。學生有機會積極參與小組專案，透過情境思考實際應用所學知識，並親自操作機器學習工具和機器人平臺，以培養實際技能。
This course is designed for practical application of robotics and artificial intelligence (AI). It adopts the project-based learning model inspired by the Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT). The course combines lectures, discussions, practical applications, and case studies to provide students with an in-depth understanding of AI and robotics technology. Students will have the opportunity to engage in group projects, apply their knowledge in real-world scenarios, and gain hands-on experience with machine learning tools and robot platforms.
